response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the fries out of the fridge. The fries are now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to heat the fries.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the fries out of the fridge
(3) Heat the fries
(4) Take the burger out of the fridge
(5) Open the top cabinet
(6) Take the platter out of the top cabinet
(7) Place the heated fries and the unheated burger on the platter
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Heat the fries
    french_fries = registry(env, "french_fries_88")
    heat(robot, french_fries)
    donothing(env)
